branchCategory.name: CG5-X6011
branchCategory.description: SMC's CG5-X6011 series is a NFPA mounting interchangeable, stainless steel cylinder, perfect for use in wash down applications such as food processing machinery requiring intense cleaning.  The use of non-toxic additives allows confident use in equipment for foods, beverages and medical products, etc.  The CG5-S can be disassembled, allowing replacement of seals, which promotes an extended service life.  SMC provides plugs for unused mounting threads to prevent residue build-up in the threads.  The use of stainless steel (SUS304) on external metal parts provides improved corrosion resistance in environments with exposure to water.

branchItem.name: C(D)G5-S-X6011, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, NFPA
branchItem.description: SMC's CG5-X6011 series is a NFPA mounting interchangeable, stainless steel cylinder, perfect for use in wash down applications such as food processing machinery requiring intense cleaning.  The use of non-toxic additives allows confident use in equipment for foods, beverages and medical products, etc.  The CG5-S can be disassembled, allowing replacement of seals, which promotes an extended service life.  SMC provides plugs for unused mounting threads to prevent residue build-up in the threads.  The use of stainless steel (SUS304) on external metal parts provides improved corrosion resistance in environments with exposure to water.
